channel.title: Bald Guy
channel.description:
If a bald guy gets his drivers license, what does he put down for hair color?
Discuss.

item.title: Bald Guy
item.dc:creator: @A_Legend A Legend
item.description:
@A_Legend wrote:

I think they have to put there natural hair color down.

Read full topic

item.title: Bald Guy

item.description:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:33, topic:256810”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=339167.msg2654652#msg2654652 date=1233778137]
Well a bald person is born with hair therefore they should put that. Unless they have some weird condition they should write N/A
[/quote]

and what if they have a weird condition where they dont grow head hair… but they DO grow crotch hair…[/quote]
what would they do? look at his pubes everytime he gets pulled over to see if its a real licenses?

The color of your eyebrows match the color of your pubes.

I have blonde eyebrows and brown pubes (yet blonde underarm/facial hair)

Guess that theory went out the window then.

[/quote]
Noes, a man named 1337h4x who was here before you had ginger pubes![/quote]
